replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: 官网下载optifine选择文件夹安装 https://www.optifine.net/downloads 别用HMCL装

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
还只有预览版本 http://optifine.net/adloadx?f=pr ... .2_HD_U_F1_pre9.jar

下下来后，双击打开即可安装

replies.author: david_builder
replies.txt_content:
https://www.optifine.net/downloads
